A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of expectations surrounded this movie and as a Star Wars fan from the beginning\, I think this movie lived up to the hype. I was impressed with the writing and how the story kept me guessing. I could not predict what would happen next. Always held my interest and I think it really was true o the characters. Luke's story arc was very satisfying and true to the character. Leia's character was very well done and a fitting tribute. There was a good mixture of action\, story\, Jedi philosophy\, and growth in the characters. I found it immensely satisfying as a Star Wars film and I think it ranks as one of the best Star Wars films ever made. Well worth seeing as a good stand alone movie in its own right. It keeps the feel of the franchise while moving the experience forward and growing on what had already been done. A great movie experience.
